posts.post_title: SOLD / lot of 9 T206's 4 sale HOF's
posts.post_content:
I'm working on a little project and I have (9) dupes available. Selling as one lot only at this time. Nice looking group which includes HOF's. 
Please drop me a PM or email if interested. They will take priority over all post's. $400 delivered takes em all. Paypal okay as money owed. 
Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Camnitz  (arms @ side) - Sweet Caporal - no creases / vg to vg/ex
Chance (yellow portrait) - Sweet Caporal - couple creases / good +
Chase (blue portrait) - Piedmont - crease & tick of paper loss on back / good+
Chase (pink portrait) - Piedmont - couple creases / good+
Hayden - Piedmont - crease / good+
Knight (batting) - Piedmont - no creases / vg to vg/ex
Leach (hands on knees) - Piedmont - no creases / vg
Randall - Sweet Caporal - light crease / vg
Wheat - Piedmont - Crease / good+
